properties.reason: There are no grocery stores within walking distance in the area. Also the location is near the MAX, which would provide close public transportation after grocery shopping.

properties.where: At the corner of 4th Avenue + Davis
properties.description: Vacant, underutilized building with boarded up windows
properties.reason: Right in the heart of Old Town, remodeled apartments could serve students who attend the University of Oregon campus, or residents seeking living situation in a district that is being revamped.

properties.where: On Couch Street between 3rd and 4th Avenue
properties.suggestion: A community space- karate studio for kids
properties.reason: There are not many spaces for community members to come together in the area.

properties.where: The Block at MLK Boulevard + NE Cook
properties.description: Big, open grassy lot with sidewalks lining edges
properties.suggestion: Community Space where people can rent office space and hold local meetings
properties.reason: The area is heavy with residences and retail shops. It could use more community support

properties.where: At the corner of MLK + NE Fargo
properties.reason: There are a lot of businesses around here, but no food.
The street is vibrant and could be expanded closer to MLK.

properties.description: Lot consisting of a mix of concrete and grass. Graffiti and other artwork on fences. Right in the middle of the vibrant Alberta street.
properties.reason: The area has plenty of food and shopping. A park that promotes play for surrounding residential areas would bring in more locals to a traditionally touristy area.

properties.where: At the corner of 23rd and Wygant
properties.description: Empty lot in the middle of residential neighborhood
properties.reason: There are a lot of houses in the area and no gardens.
